CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 25, 1945, pg. 23 reads: "Four Years Old - Master Bobby Jones, son of Mr. and Mrs. Herman Jones, of Wylie Avenue, celebrated his fourth birthday last Wednesday. His father is serving with the Navy somewhere in Pacific. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Six boys and six girls, including: Howard Shepherd seated on floor, Pat Austin standing far left, Earl Harris second from left seated on arm of chair, Lorraine Wright holding ball, Rita Howell seated wearing grid patterned dress, Harold Wright seated third from right, Anthony Farrell seated second from right, and Barbara Jan Goggins seated far right, posed behind coffee table with birthday cake for four-year-old Bobby Jones, in home of Mr. and Mrs. Herman Jones, Wylie Avenue
